/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, bathed in sunlight, stretches out ahead, flanked by towering buildings on either side. The buildings, predominantly gray and white, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding depth to the expansive vista. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The perspective gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle, looking down upon it all.
